bug.author: xauthulei
bug.summary: kubeflow-presubmit error when change/modfiy under tensorflow-notebook-image
bug.description:
/kind bug
[A clear and concise description of what the bug is.] I have committed a PR <denchmark-link:https://github.com/kubeflow/kubeflow/pull/3879>#3879</denchmark-link> , it is failed at "kubeflow-presubmit". What did you expect to happen: Fixed it and tested pass. comments.comment: Issue-Label Bot is automatically applying the label kind/bug to this issue, with a confidence of 0.98. Please mark this comment with üëç or üëé to give our bot feedback! Links: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/marketplace/issue-label-bot>app homepage</denchmark-link> , <denchmark-link:https://mlbot.net/data/kubeflow/kubeflow>dashboard</denchmark-link> and <denchmark-link:https://github.com/hamelsmu/MLapp>code</denchmark-link> for this bot.

Reference the error :<denchmark-link:https://github.com/ksonnet/ksonnet/issues/883>ksonnet/ksonnet#883</denchmark-link>
Seems we need to upgrade the ks version. If so, we need to change the to in the <denchmark-link:https://github.com/kubeflow/kubeflow/blob/master/components/tensorflow-notebook-image/releaser/app.yaml>app.yaml</denchmark-link> compared with other <denchmark-link:https://github.com/kubeflow/kubeflow/blob/master/components/jupyter-web-app/releaser/app.yaml>app.yaml</denchmark-link> under , also more details can see: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/kubeflow/testing/blob/master/py/kubeflow/testing/ks_util.py>ks_util.py</denchmark-link>
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/xauthulei>@xauthulei</denchmark-link> thanks for debugging; Do you want to submit a PR to upgrade the tests?
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/jlewi>@jlewi</denchmark-link> , Yea, I am willing to, Thanks
it looks like PR <denchmark-link:https://github.com/kubeflow/kubeflow/pull/3879>#3879</denchmark-link> will fix this presubmit error

<denchmark-link:https://github.com/kkasravi>@kkasravi</denchmark-link> , <denchmark-link:https://github.com/jlewi>@jlewi</denchmark-link> , I am try to fix this issue, Could you review the PR <denchmark-link:https://github.com/kubeflow/kubeflow/pull/3879>#3879</denchmark-link> . Thanks.
As the PR <denchmark-link:https://github.com/kubeflow/kubeflow/pull/3879>#3879</denchmark-link> is merged, so close this issue.
